verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:24
verses.text: And Micaiah said, Behold, thou shalt see on that day when thou shalt go into an inner chamber to hide thyself.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:25
verses.text: Then the king of Israel said, Take ye Micaiah, and carry him back to Amon the governor of the city, and to Joash the king’s son;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:26
verses.text: And say, Thus saith the king, Put this fellow in the prison, and feed him with bread of affliction and with water of affliction, until I return in peace.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:27
verses.text: And Micaiah said, If thou certainly return in peace, then hath not the Lord spoken by me. And he said, Hearken, all ye people.
